name: 1delta
shortDescription: Universal lending and DeFi aggregator with powerful APIs for lending, payments, swapping, and bridging.
description:
1delta is a universal lending aggregator enabling users to lend, borrow, and loop positions across multiple liquidity sources with maximum efficiency. In addition to its advanced lending aggregation layer, 1delta provides both a DEX aggregator and a bridge aggregatorâ€”ensuring the best execution for swaps and cross-chain transfers on Moonbeam.

Beyond the user interface, 1delta offers a robust suite of developer APIs, giving builders direct access to its lending, payments, and execution infrastructure. These APIs make it easy to embed lending flows, automate position management, enable on-chain payments, or integrate optimized swap and bridge routing into external applications.

By unifying lending, swapping, bridging, and programmatic access through powerful APIs, 1delta delivers a seamless and capital-efficient DeFi experience for both users and developers.
